Actions.Text: REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Votes.VoteType: Favorable refer to committee Ways and Means

Title: Relates to rental and mortgage payments of supportive housing for the mentally ill
Summary: Relates to rental and mortgage payments of supportive housing for the mentally ill; provides for the reimbursement to agencies for costs associated with the rental or ownership of supportive housing subject to the availability of appropriations therefor and the reasonableness of such costs.
LawCode: Amd ยง41.38, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to rental and mortgage payments of supportive housing for the mentally ill
